channel.title: Movies on 2D Steve
channel.description: Recent content in Movies on 2D Steve

item.title: Memorial Day!
item.description: I have had probably the most uneventful Memorial Day weekend of my entire life, but at the same time a few really cool things did happen.

item.title: Commitment
item.description: It’s been a long time since I’ve written anything of any kind in this blog and for that, I apologize.

item.title: Writing Bugs
item.description: I’ve got the writing bug again, although I have to admit that it’s not exactly for this blog.

item.title: Home Movies!
item.description: Yesterday I finally finished going through all the home movies that I have, and I actually found a few things that I had forgotten that I recorded.
